title: Just a Little Honesty
description: When a prison break puts a dangerous convict on the loose, eighteen-year-old Julie Little is faced with making the biggest decision of her life: run away, or face her biggest fear. And when her Uncle Charlie puts forth a plan to have Detective Bruno get her out of Oakland (and as far away from the danger as possible), she’s in no hurry to put up a fight. But when a sudden change of plans demands Bruno’s attention at home, Julie’s suddenly left to escape with no one but Officer Lucas Reibeck himself.And their escape is only the beginning….
author: Tracie Puckett
